group_1.textCenter: A Diviner is one who makes her wish for the village...@For the sake of the Land of the Rising Sun...
I know I mustn't make a wish for@my benefit alone, but...
I simply can't bear the thought of being@unable to share my feelings with him...
It's selfish of me to want to tell him@how I feel...
I don't even have the courage to tell him@how much I adore him, and yet...I...

group_1.narration: ...Courage, huh?@...Why does love have to be so painful?
Love was the very reason I became a Magical Girl.@It's incredibly important to me.
The outcome of my wish wasn't a rewarding one...@but it's better to take a step forward and see@what happens than to stay in the dark.@You'll have no regrets that way.

group_1.textCenter: I dunno what's goin' on, exactly...@But you can't give up.
You really love that guy, don't you?
That level of passion must be putting you@through a lot of distress and pain...
I got your back, though, so don't give up!

group_1.narration: I feel bad for cuttin' in like that, but...@Well, it's just a dream, in the end.

group_1.textCenter: (Probably 'cause of that fairy tale Mitama and@Shizuka and everyone else chatted about...)

group_1.textRight: Look who's finally awake!
Just when we returned to our room@after a rousing day of fun,
you conked right out!

group_1.textLeft: (Yeah, I remember coming back here to round@up all that stuff and then playin' around all day...)
It's been a while since I've last been to@the beach, so maybe I'm just tired...

group_1.textRight: I can't believe you got that excited.@I suppose you're still a child at heart, then.
Why, you were even muttering@in your sleep...
...about how you couldn't find@the Mocha Rabbit doll in your bag!

group_1.textLeft: That's a blatant lie. Cut it out.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: We're returning to the village where@we're staying.
Would you two like to join us?

group_1.textRight: The residents will be holding a festival@in our honor.
I'm certain they'll welcome you both as well.

group_1.textLeft: We appreciate the offer, but...what did you@mean by "a festival in our honor?"

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, we haven't explained it yet...
Basically, the village nearby is@a branch of the Tokime Clan!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...I thought everyone in your clan@lived up in the mountains.

group_1.textRight: Truth be told, I wasn't aware of this village@until I rallied the Tokime Clan together...
I also learned for the first time that Diviners are@considered a superstition around these parts.
Apparently, the village hasn't@had a Diviner in ages.
That's why they're having a festival to introduce@and welcome us as Diviners.
As part of that,
we will attempt to explain Diviners to@the villagers in our own terms.

group_1.textLeft: Ah. Seems like a more serious festival@than I thought...

group_1.textRight: Only the part focusing on the Diviners.@The rest is just a normal festival.
I truly want you two to be able@to enjoy yourselves there.

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case...then we can go, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes. We'll take you up on that.
Consider it thanks for the fun day@we had together.
And for explaining things to@the resort manager for us!
Having you join us is the least@we can do.

group_1.textLeft: There's no need to thank us@just for that...
But if you're going to do all that@anyway...
Could you introduce me to someone@in the know at the village?

group_1.textRight: I can probably get you to meet with@the elder...but what for?

group_1.textLeft: It's for the treasure hunt, of course!
